DOC.brief_title: Assessing Fever Rates Children Ages 24 59 Months After Live Attenuated Influenza Vaccine ( LAIV ) Inactivated Influenza Vaccines ( IIV ) Using Text Messaging U.S . Influenza Vaccines 2012-2013 & 2013-2014
DOC.criteria: 1. 24 59 month age , 2. visit study site anytime study period , 3. receive first dose LAIV IIV season , 4. parent cell phone text messaging capability , 5. parent speaks English Spanish . Exclusion criterion : 1. chronic medical condition child precludes receipt LAIV ( except history asthma wheeze episode within past 12 month note medical record ) , 2. currently oral systemic steroid use past month , 3. currently inhale steroid use past 2 week , 4. presence fever > =100.4 time vaccination , 5. administration antipyretic 6hour period prior vaccination , 6. state intent , time vaccination , use prophylactic antipyretic development fever , 7. parent speaks language English Spanish , 8. parent 's inability read text message , 9. child receive second dose influenza vaccine current season .
